basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Allison Eglow. My relationship with yoga began in 2016 but it wasnâ€™t firmly planted until 2020 when I got a lower back injury. The practice of syncing breath with movement helped quiet my mind and soothe my body. I completed a 200-hour teacher training at Indigo Yoga in 2022 and I want to use yoga to create positive change and reach as many humans as possible. I enjoy teaching a Vinyasa flow that incorporates strength with breath work. I aim to share a simple and playful approach while encouraging students to explore their own movement and breath. I believes everyone, of all shapes and sizes, can practice yoga and am deeply committed to fostering an inclusive space for all.

projects.title: Trophy Employee
projects.description: I was responsible for developing the website for a startup company. The goal was to make a website that was simple and provide a 'Coming Soon' section for the software this company is building.

projects.title: Livingston Philanthropies
projects.description: This was the first project I worked on when I starting my career. I built a website for a local non-profit so donors can find out more information about the non-profit.
